title: The Canadian trucker protest is in its second week. This is how we got here - CNN
content:
1. The Canadian trucker protest is in its second week. This is how we got here  CNN
  2. Canada 'Freedom Convoy': Ottawa police arrest 7, threaten charges for others caught bringing fuel to truckers  Fox News
  3. Canadian-style trucker protests spread throughout the world  Fox News
  4. Canada's Trucker Protest May Spread From Ottawa to US  Bloomberg
  5. Canada's truck convoy is a stunt  The Washington Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: A massive protest by Canadian truckers and others against Covid-19 mandates has entered a second week, crippling downtown Ottawa with no end in sight. The city's mayor has declared a state of emergency, and the capital's police chief is calling for outside help to deal with the protesters.
